rukus.text: wama khalaqna l-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina l-nari
am najʿalu alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati kal-muf'sidina fi l-ardi am najʿalu l-mutaqina kal-fujari
kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaru ayatihi waliyatadhakkara ulu l-albabi
wawahabna lidawuda sulaymana niʿ'ma l-ʿabdu innahu awwabun
idh ʿurida ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi l-safinatu l-jiyadu
faqala inni ahbabtu hubba l-khayri ʿan dhik'ri rabbi hatta tawarat bil-hijabi
rudduha ʿalayya fatafiqa mashan bil-suqi wal-aʿnaqi
walaqad fatanna sulaymana wa-alqayna ʿala kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
qala rabbi igh'fir li wahab li mul'kan la yanbaghi li-ahadin min baʿdi innaka anta l-wahabu
fasakharna lahu l-riha tajri bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
hadha ʿatauna fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
wa-inna lahu ʿindana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin
